channel.title: What Java file should Sprites be loaded in?
channel.description:
I want to change the path names for sprites instead of just saving over the old ones! But,I Can't find the right .Java!
Can anyone help? :confused:
Thanks in advance! Code God Of Rs

item.title: What Java file should Sprites be loaded in?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Tylerholmes, post:2, topic:329873”][size=36pt]They Should Be In Sprites.Java! [/size]
[size=12pt]Duh Everyone Knows That![/size][/quote]

wrong again, stop posting shit you have no idea wtf your talking about.

@topic: in non renamed, the common .java file used to handle sprite directories is Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.

i hope i helped
